name: Artillerize local Co-op
description:
Early demo of the local co-op version of Artillerize. Mac only for now and 2 x-box 360 controllers are needed.

D-pad to move

A- Jump

X- draw hand gun and shoot

Y- spawn build cursor, use this to drag and drop objects with A button. Y again to kill it. A button over walls repairs them.

B- Use the unit aircraft gun, Also to use the ammo dispenser.

alt+Q to quit fullscreen

there are bugs, lots of bugs.

contact me on colburt187@hotmail.com
